desc: Shameless Soap Co™ brings you amazing, down to earth skin care products handcrafted locally in the Midwest. Our small batches ensure that you’ll get the freshest products without all the chemicals. We utilize local resources whenever possible because we strongly believe in supporting the community in which we serve.

layout.text:
Thank you for visiting.
We are currently taking a break and rebuilding the website.
Sign up for our email program to get notified when we re-open!
